== Dashboard ==

=== Option 1: Install Ubuntu Package ===

  * Step 1 - Add the Afrimesh package archive keys to your system:
  {{{
  sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys 382AF1D2
  }}}

  * Step 2 - Add the Afrimesh Package archive to  Synaptic Package Manager:
  
  Start Synaptic (System->Administration) and go to Settings->Repositories->Third-Party Software.

  Click on Add and enter the following line:
  {{{
  deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/awn-testing/ubuntu jaunty main
  }}}
  
  * Step 3 - Hit reload and install the afrimesh-dashboard package

  More information [https://launchpad.net/+help/soyuz/ppa-sources-list.html here]
